Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6387 affecting package openssh for versions less than 9.8p1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6387 affecting package openssh for versions less than 9.8p1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssh is earlier than 9.8p1-1, affected by CVE-2024-6387
